scripts.start: npm install && npm run supabase:start && npm run gen:types
scripts.start-reset: npm install && npm run supabase:start && npm run db:reset
scripts.restart: npm run supabase:stop && npm run start
scripts.restart-reset: npm run supabase:stop && npm run start-reset
scripts.migration:squash: npm run migration:new squashed && npx supabase migration squash --local
scripts.db:reset: npx supabase db reset --local && npm run gen:types
scripts.db:validate: npm run db:reset && npm run db:lint && npm run db:test
